name: Skullman Quits a Job!
description:
Skullman Quits a Job

a 2d tile-based action prototype inspired by Mega Man Battle Network (or Rockman.EXE), where a skull man is tired of his job as a servant to Satan and tries to escape from his workplace. Enjoy!

Controls
  • up, down, left, and right key: move cursor/player
  • space key: accept/shoot
  • z key: use an item
